MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_PROPOSITION_REJECTED: Notification for a reject of an upload proposition
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_ACTIVATED: Notification for the activation of an upload request
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_CLOSED_BY_OWNER: Upload request has been closed by the owner
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_CLOSED_BY_RECIPIENT: Upload request has been closed by the recipient
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_DELETED_BY_OWNER: Upload request deleted by the owner
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_NO_SPACE_LEFT: No space left for this upload request
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_WARN_RECIPIENT_EXPIRY: Warning sent to the recipient for the upload request expiry
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_WARN_OWNER_EXPIRY: Warning notification to the owner for the upload request expiry
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_REMINDER: A reminder for the upload request
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_UPDATED: The upload request has been updated
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_WARN_RECIPIENT_BEFORE_EXP: Warning notification sent to the recipient before the upload request expiry
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_WARN_OWNER_BEFORE_EXPIRY: Warning notification sent to the owner before the upload request expiry
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_CREATION_ACKNOWLEDGMENT_FOR_OWNER: Sharing creative receipt for the issuer
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.SHARE_CREATION_ACKNOWLEDGMENT_WITH_SPECI: Sharing creative receipt for transmitter with personalized subject
MAIL_CONTENT_TYPE.UPLOAD_REQUEST_FILE_DELETED_BY_SENDER: Notification of deleting a file from the external user

BOX_FORM.HELP_COMPLETION_PAGE_SIZE: Maximum result per page in completion

GUESTS__RESTRICTED.NAME: Contacts restriction
GUESTS__RESTRICTED.DESCRIPTION: You can restrict guests to share only with a restricted and personnal list of emails. By default, the guest will be restricted to his owner.

GUESTS__EXPIRATION_ALLOW_PROLONGATION.NAME: Postpone guest expiry date
GUESTS__EXPIRATION_ALLOW_PROLONGATION.DESCRIPTION: Allow internal users to edit and postpone the expiry date of a guest

PARAMETERS.GUESTS__RESTRICTED__BOOLEAN_false: The guest will not be restricted.
PARAMETERS.GUESTS__RESTRICTED__BOOLEAN_true: The guest will be restricted to a list of emails.
PARAMETERS.GUESTS__CAN_UPLOAD__BOOLEAN_false: The guest will not have the deposit right by default.
PARAMETERS.GUESTS__CAN_UPLOAD__BOOLEAN_true: The guest will have the deposit right by default.
PARAMETERS.GUESTS__EXPIRATION_ALLOW_PROLONGATION__B: The user can not extend the expiration date of a guest.
The user can extend the expiration date of a guest.
PARAMETERS.ANONYMOUS_URL__BOOLEAN_false: The anonymous shares will not be secured by a password when created.
PARAMETERS.ANONYMOUS_URL__BOOLEAN_true: The anonymous shares will be secured by a password when created.
PARAMETERS.SHARE_EXPIRATION__DELETE_FILE_ON_EXPIRAT: The document will not be removed at the expiration of the last share.
The document will be removed at the expiration of the last share.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_CLOSE__BOOLEAN_false: The recipient can not close the upload request.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_CLOSE__BOOLEAN_true: The recipient can close the upload request.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__CAN_DELETE__BOOLEAN_fals: The recipient can not delete files.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__PROLONGATION__BOOLEAN_fa: The sender will not postpone the expiry date.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__PROLONGATION__BOOLEAN_tr: The sender will postpone the expiry date.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__SECURED_URL__BOOLEAN_fal: The access to the invitation will not be protected by a password.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__SECURED_URL__BOOLEAN_tru: The access to the invitation will be protected by a password.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__GROUPED_MODE__BOOLEAN_fa: An invitation will be created per recipient.
PARAMETERS.UPLOAD_REQUEST__GROUPED_MODE__BOOLEAN_tr: All recipients share the conditions of use of the invitation.
PARAMETERS.SHARE_CREATION_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_FOR_OWNER: No acknowledgment will be sent to the issuer of the share.
An acknowledgement will be sent to the issuer of the share.

Vous pouvez rechercher par nom, prénom et email, il vous suffira de séléctionner le membre.You can add members to the group using the search box below.
